author: n3tsurge
description: This capability involves establishing the ability to find transferred data by content pattern. This includes implementing systems and processes that can analyze and identify specific content patterns within data that has been transferred across networks or systems. It is essential for ensuring data integrity, compliance, and security by enabling the detection of unauthorized or sensitive data transfers based on predefined content patterns.

requirements.description: Staff must be trained and qualified to perform this capability effectively.
Documented procedures and playbooks must be available for executing this capability.
Network monitoring tools and access to network infrastructure for analysis and control.

title: Establish Ability to Find Transferred Data by Content Pattern

references.name: NIST SP 800-137: Information Security Continuous Monitoring (ISCM)
MITRE ATT&CK: Discovery Tactics and Detection Strategies
CISA Zero Trust Architecture - Monitoring and Analytics
